roleset.name: become mellow, relaxed
roleset.note: MELLOW-V NOTES: Frames file for 'mellow' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entry other_cos-45.4, the usual suspects as other members. (from mellow.01-v)

example.name: from the corpus
example.text: They have since mellowed, although one senior Young& Rubicam executive, echoing others, said: ``I think ad agencies owe Carl Spielvogel a vote of thanks for getting him out of the consulting business.''
example.arg: although one senior Young& Rubicam executive, echoing others, said: ``I think ad agencies owe Carl Spielvogel a vote of thanks for getting him out of the consulting business

example.name: with instrument
example.text: John mellowed considerably through the application of advanced pharmaceuticals.
example.arg: through the application of advanced pharmaceuticals

roleset.name: mellow_out: relax into a stable state
roleset.note: MELLOW_OUT-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. (from mellow.02-v)

example.name: With CAU
example.text: Maybe they mellow out with age .
